TopicTitle: How Do I Apply RealPlume Configs to Engines?

Articles.Content:
I installed RealPlume through CKAN, and got the stock configs. However, now all my engines have no effects whatsoever. I have all the mods RealPlume depends on installed, and everything is updated. 

Please help!

I don't use CKAN to install mods,because i have read that sometimes "stuff" is not updated correctly.But i'm sure you will find your answer in original thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/116292-104-realplume-stock-configs-v081-2015281/
